alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 11:13AM EST until March 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood and Big Blue River. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Blue River at Shelbyville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water reaches CR 425W. Some agricultural land and extremely low-lying areas like Bear Chase golf course are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1115 PM EST.
